name: Synergy Way
tagline: Web and Software Development Service Provider.
description:
Synergy Way is a web and software development services provider with a development center in Lviv, Ukraine. Our team offers IT services to clients all around the world, mostly, USA and EU.
Setting up a development team in Eastern Europe allows our clients not only to optimise the budget without losing quality but also, to involve open-minded and skilled professionals in the project.
Our expertise covers services for small businesses and middle-sized enterprises as well. We have solid experience in developing map-based apps, navigation, geolocation, real-time tracking systems and payment processing systems. We are good at creating website designs and developing websites of varying complexity.
